content.content: Posting this here to get some more eye balls on this and also as a follow-up to Meta: we should value privacy more   github.com/ethereum/EIPs      Issue: zkERC20: Confidential Token Standard  	 	opened by zac-williamson 	on 2019-01-25 	 	 	  eip: 1724 title: Confidential Token Standard author: AZTEC discussions-to: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/1724 status: Draft type: Standards Track category: ERC created: 2019-01-25 requires: 1723  Simple Summary This EIP defines the standard interface and behaviours...
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is sharing a link to a proposal on Github and asking for more people to review it. The proposal is for a new standard interface and behaviors for confidential tokens. The post also includes some basic information about the proposal, such as the title, author, and status. Some third parties have given positive feedback and constructive criticism, while others are asking questions about the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback
Author of proposal is explaining proposal
